member.name: EMRSETPIXELV
member.summary: The EMRSETPIXELV structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record. When an enhanced metafile is created, calls to are also recorded in this record.

member.name: EMRSETPIXELV.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRSETPIXELV.crColor
member.summary: Color value. To make a COLORREF value, use the macro.
